mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_CONTENT, R.ENROLL_DATE, USER_NICKNAME, L.LOCATION_STAR, R.USER_NO, R.LOCATION_NO FROM REVIEW R JOIN LOCATION L ON (R.LOCATION_NO = L.LOCATION_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE L.LOCATION_NO = #{locationNo} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NO DESC
SELECT ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM PICTURE WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo}
SELECT ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM PICTURE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY PIC_NO DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_STAR, REVIEW_CONTENT, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, USER_NO, LOCATION_NO ) VALUES( NEXTVAL('SEQ_REV'), #{starCount}, #{content}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{userNo}, #{locationNo} );
INSERT INTO PICTURE( PIC_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL, REVIEW_NO ) VALUES (NEXTVAL('SEQ_PIC'), #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{path}, DEFAULT, CURRVAL('SEQ_REV') )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE LOCATION_NO = #{locationNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OWNER_REPLY (OWNER_REPLY_NO, REVIEW_NO, ENROLL_DATE, OWNER_REPLY_CONTENT ) VALUES (NEXTVAL('SEQ_OWRE'), #{reviewNo}, DEFAULT, #{content} )
